TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PrintServer extends System.Printing.PrintSystemObject

summary.span: 管理列印伺服器上的列印佇列，而列印伺服器通常是電腦，但也可以是專屬的硬體列印伺服器應用裝置。

span.span: Manages the print queues on a print server, which is usually a computer, but can be a dedicated hardware print server appliance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您的程式會將值寫入的屬性，變更沒有任何作用，直到它會傳遞給電腦所表示之物件。When your program writes a value to a property of , that change has no effect until it is passed on to the computer that is represented by the object. 若要認可變更，使用物件方法。To commit changes, use the method for the object. 同樣地，其他應用程式可能會變更實際列印服務電腦的屬性。Similarly, other applications may change the actual print service properties of the computer. 若要確定物件為您的程式具有的最新的值，請使用物件方法。To make sure that the object for your program has the latest values, use the method for the object. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的執行個體。The following example shows how to create an instance of . [!code-csharp[PrintServerCreate#_CreatePrintServer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintServerCreate/CSharp/PrintServerCreate.cs#_createprintserver)] [!code-vb[PrintServerCreate#_CreatePrintServer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintServerCreate/visualbasic/printservercreate.vb#_createprintserver)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

summary.span: 將應用程式對列印伺服器物件之屬性所做的任何變更寫入至該物件所代表的列印伺服器，以認可所有的變更。

span.span: Commits any changes that your program made to the properties of the print server object by writing them to the print server that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不想初始化這三個佇列的， ，或屬性; 您可以傳遞空字串的一個或多個`printQueueShareName`， `printQueueComment`，和`printQueueLocation`。If you do not want to initialize all three of the queue's , , or properties; you can pass an empty string for one or more of `printQueueShareName`, `printQueueComment`, and `printQueueLocation`. 如果您想要初始化只是其中一個屬性，使用這個方法多載。If you want to initialize just one of these properties, use the overload of this method.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器的連接埠執行緒會讀取多工緩衝處理檔案、 處理資料，並將資料傳送給連接埠監視器，然後將資料傳送至印表機。The port thread for the server reads the spool file, processes the data, and sends the data to a port monitor, which then sends the data to the printer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 物件的屬性 (Property)，讓每個屬性值符合物件所代表之列印伺服器的對應屬性 (Attribute) 值。

span.span: Updates the properties of the object so that each property value matches the corresponding attribute value of the print server that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您對屬性進行任何變更可能會遺失時方法執行。Any changes that you make to the properties of a can be lost when the method executes. 如果您並未尚未寫入變更此物件表示與列印伺服器，就會發生此遺失。This loss occurs if you did not yet write the changes to the print server that the object represents with .

exception.span: 部分屬性無法重新整理。

span.span: Some of the properties cannot be refreshed.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者在啟動印表機集區下，是否能在發生錯誤後重新啟動工作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can restart jobs after an error occurs if printer pooling is enabled.

span.span: if jobs can be restarted when printer pooling is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端程式必須具有系統管理權限才能設定此值。A calling program must have administrative permissions to set this value.

span.span: The wait time, in minutes, before a job restarts.
